author: nick
msg: For places formatting numbers in fixed formats, or case-insensitive comparing Ascii strings, use Locale.ROOT not Locale.getDefault() to ensure predictable behaviour, and avoid issues in locales like Turkish. TIKA-1387

author: robbie
msg: QPIDJMS-25: update to support staged SASL negotiation rather than an immediately pipelined ANONYMOUS exchange, depends on some uncommitted PROTON SASL hacks/tweaks

author: robbie
msg: QPIDJMS-25: initial experimenting with Netty integration

author: tpalsulich
msg: Re-enabling forbidden-apis and working around identified errors in External and Moses Translators.
